title: The higher the honor the more keys you should be able to get
body: You're able to get 12 key fragments naturally, but why not since is the more honorable you've been? like 15 for honor 3 18 for 4 and 21 for 5, Maybe less maybe more depending on riot.

replies.body:
Technically you do already.

You can get capsules when you are H3, which has two keys inside.
We're always open to player ideas! This is best posted over in Client Discussion, as that would be the best way to get player feedback and more visibility towards the devs!
